des:
The Night Night skill says nice words, and plays a bedtime lullaby! Perfect when you want to relax before bedtime.

ABOUT HEALING.FM
In today's fast-paced, busy life, the Healing.fm Skills are designed to help you recharge your soul, lift your spirits and enjoy little moments of peace. More than 100,000+ people every month trust Healing.fm's high quality voice skills for meditation, relaxation and a good night's sleep.
